name: Slime in the Box
description:
Slime in the box...

The idea of one room brings out the image of a slime in a room... or, a box?

Download:

Go bottom ↓↓↓

Control:

[W][A][S][D] to select box.

Slime will eat smaller monsters and hit by larger monsters.

It's ATK will wave according to the difference in ATK with the monster it meet.

KEEP IT'S ATK BETWEEN 1~6!
